title: Mahou Shoujo Elena
synopsis: With the help from a mysterious creature, Elena turned herself into a magical girl to beat Zoid, a tentacle monster to save her sister, Emile.
staff: [['Sakurai, Masaaki', ['Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design', ' Chief Animation Director']], ['Yakushi, Ruri', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Performance']], ['Itoman, Akira', ['Art Director']]]
